text: Ate alaha ne tuhade la'i apani'am paida kiti'am ho'i'am cizam di cham bana'i ate tuhade la'i paharam vica lukana vasate (gufavam) bana'i'am ate tuhade la'i ajihe kapare bana'e jihare tuhanu garami tom baca'unde hana ate yudha vica rakhi'a karade hana. Isa tar'ham alaha tuhade la'i apane upakaram nu pura karada hai tam ki tusim hukama manana vale bade bano
